description: The two stabbings took place within 10 minutes on nearby roads in Sheffield, police say.
title: Police investigate possible link between stabbings
title_page: Police investigate possible link between stabbings - BBC News
maintext:
Police are investigating whether two stabbings which took place in Sheffield within minutes of each other were linked.
A 34-year-old man was taken to hospital with "non-life-threatening" injuries following a suspected stabbing on Fieldhead Road at about 17:30 GMT on Monday, according to South Yorkshire Police.
About 10 minutes later, officers were called by the ambulance service to Abbeydale Road, after reports a man, 22, had been stabbed.
The 22-year-old man was later discharged from hospital after treatment, but the 34-year-old remained in hospital on Tuesday, a force spokesperson said.
